descriptionProfile: The best SoCal wedding ideas from SoCal. Use #socalbrideblog for a chance to be featured * = recommended vendors. Get inspired + find vendors ⤵️

posts.description:
Hey SoCal Bride Members! My dear friend at the @editorstouch is offering a 20% off discount on her full website design package to members of our Vendor Network! Having a beautiful website is so important and Heather from the @editorstouch can help you with that! ***If you are not a member of our Vendor Network (1) you're missing out! and (2) reach out to us for details on how to join! There may or may not be a special offer if you sign up!

PROMO ENDS: Friday, April 28th at the end of the day. Discount does not apply to people who have already hired/are on the calendar with The Editor's Touch. 
#theeditorstouch #websitedesign #socalweddingvendor #socalweddingvendors #weddingphotographer #weddingplanner #weddingrentals #weddingcakedesigner #invitationdesigner

This modern & classic styled shoot is featured on the blog today! LINK IN BIO to see more!

photography: @michellefloresphotography | planner: @rrobertsevents | venue: @ebelloflb | beauty: @corincruzmakeup | wedding gown: @monamiebridalsalon | floral design: @hanayafloralworks | rentals: @cherishedrentals | linens: @luxe_linen | desserts: @pattys.cakes | design: @forrestanddj | menswear: @friartux | @heididavidsondesign 
#featuredonSCB #weddingblog #weddingblogger #ebelloflb #longbeachwedding #longbeachweddings #ebelloflbweddings #socalweddingideas #weddinginspiration #wedspiration #bridalideas #brideandgroomphotos

SAMPLE SALE!

@loveandlacebridalsalon is having a huge SAMPLE SALE blowout on Thursday and Friday, April 27-28!!! All designer dresses will be $1500 and under! Floor samples sizes range between 8-12. Appointment are required; all appointments will be 45 minutes long and you will be limited to trying on sample sale dresses only. Please call the salon for an appointment (949) 861-8455. *About sample sales - they're a great opportunity to get gorgeous gowns at a amazing deal. If the gowns are not your size, you can usually have them altered to fit your body! Go and schedule your appointment today!

Photo: @dianamariephoto 
#ocbridalsalon #bridalgowns #weddingdresses #weddingdresssamplesale #orangecountybridalsalon
posts.localization: Love and Lace Bridal and Tailor
